sources.title: Secret_Evidence
sources.description: When lawyer David Harrison becomes the new District Attorney he asks Linda his secretary to become his fianc√©, but soon Linda and her brother are falsely accused of shooting an ex-con that has eyes for Linda, and the ex-con would rather see Linda go to prison than to let her become the new D.A.'s wife.

metadata.Plot: Aviation journalist Nick Cook investigates UFO sightings from the 1940s to the 1990s. Are these sightings the result of secret high-technology military programs?
metadata.Actors: Nick Cook, John B. Alexander, David Clarke
